page.title: 15The Village Environment.
page.content: Our village has got a lot of .Our village has got several buildings one of which is the church.It was built in 1851,and is very well kept inside.We have a chapel,which a lot of activities are conected to.We have one shop in the whole of the village.The only really big disadvantage is that most things there are very expensive.We have a Conservative Club next door to the chapel.We also have got a pub called the Rose and Crown which is just down the road from the club.The school in Hartwell has children ageing from 4 to 11.We have roughly 180 children in the school.In Ashton school there are only about 25 children in the whole school. In our village we have got a nice view of the forest but we also have the M1 motorway which is noisy and dirty. Rebecca Howells,11 yrs.
